### What are ClinRTools?

ClinRTools help clinical trial specialists to plan new studies.

This Demo version contains a limited amount of Tools.

**Demo version of ClinRTools is distributed without any warranty and should be used at your own risk.**

Please remember to verify/validate the results with the biostatistician

### Technical details

ClinRTools use R language to provide all the computations.

R sessions are running on the server, so users are not required to have a local installation.

Reproducible code and environment options can be found in each of the Tools pages.

### Help and Feedback

Demo version of ClinRTools is distributed without any official support.

Any questions, feedback and inquiries can be sent to [Ed Parsadanyan](https://www.linkedin.com/in/parsadanyan/){target="_blank"}.
